Frequently Ask Questions

How can we help you?​

You’ve got questions, we’ve got answers! (Well, hopefully.) Check out some of our frequently asked questions below. ​​

CLEVERCOW QUESTIONS

A really, really smart cow. We kid! CleverCow is an online community designed to democratise and fast-track the road to a sustainable future.

Our platform allows anyone to purchase carbon credits that have been produced through verified sustainable farming practices. A CleverCow subscription works to:

  • Reduce your personal impact by offsetting some of your individual carbon footprint.
  • Directly contribute to farming projects focused on emissions avoidance and emissions reductions to help grow their impact.
  • Remove carbon credits from the market, ultimately making it more expensive for big emitters to pollute.

Together we can work to shift the dial and build the future we want to see. There are truly no downsides to being a CleverCow!

CleverCow emphasizes sustainability through agriculture to reduce carbon emissions, promote responsible farming, and support local economies.

Sustainable behavior change is essential, but offsetting emissions helps us deal with what cannot be reduced immediately. CleverCow supports both approaches to achieve the greatest impact on our climate goals.

Farms can join CleverCow by applying through our website. Once verified, farms can start creating carbon credits through sustainable farming practices and be part of the CleverCow community.

CLEVERCOW QUESTIONS

CleverCow is an online community designed to democratise and fast-track the road to a sustainable future. Our platform allows anyone to purchase carbon credits that have been produced through verified sustainable farming practices.
CleverCow emphasizes sustainability through agriculture to reduce carbon emissions, promote responsible farming, and support local economies.
A carbon credit is a permit that allows the holder to emit a certain amount of carbon dioxide or other greenhouse gases. One credit permits the emission of one ton of carbon dioxide or the equivalent in other greenhouse gases.
Carbon offsetting involves reducing or removing carbon dioxide emissions from the atmosphere to compensate for emissions produced elsewhere. It is an effective strategy to achieve carbon neutrality.

Referral Questions

The referral program allows you to invite friends to CleverCow. You earn rewards when they sign up and participate using your referral link.
You can share your referral link through social media, email, or directly with friends. Your referral link is available in your CleverCow dashboard.
You can refer anyone who might be interested in reducing their carbon footprint and supporting sustainable farming practices.
By referring a friend, you help grow the CleverCow community, contribute to sustainability efforts, and both you and your friend may receive rewards!
You can refer as many people as you like! There are no limits to how many friends you can invite to CleverCow.
You can track your referrals and rewards in the "Referrals" section of your CleverCow dashboard.
Rewards will be credited to your CleverCow account within 30 days after your referred friend successfully joins and completes their first subscription.
If you've been referred, simply use the referral link to sign up. You'll receive a reward after completing your first subscription, and your friend who referred you will also be rewarded!

If you don’t find your answer here, please shoot us a message via the Contact Us form.
